text:
Hello @all

There is minor questions if this is possible in HubSpot.

There is a gaming dashboard page which shows dynamic generated data through api like reward points and other things in it. If the gamer is viewing this page then he will need to login through login page which is developed in HubSpot(Client want this login page in HubSpot).

Client has Register page in other platform.

Is it possible that login and register page are on different platform's and user can login with email id and password to see private page in HubSpot.
